meanings.definition: A person, typically a man, who is flashy in appearance and behavior, often involved in shady or illegal activities.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood was wary of the spivs who frequented the dark alleyways.
meanings.sent2: The spivs at the party stood out with their loud suits and extravagant jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The spivs tried to sell fake watches, but everyone could see through their act.
meanings.sent4: The spivs were like peacocks, strutting around with their feathers on display.
meanings.sent5: The image of the spivs lingered in the minds of the townspeople, a symbol of deception and excess.
